biotools.summary: Efficient and effective method for constructing phylogenetic networks. It takes as input a set of rooted phylogenetic trees given in Newick format (inputfile shows an example of input data).

bioschemas.name: LNETWORK
bioschemas.summary: Efficient and effective method for constructing phylogenetic networks. It takes as input a set of rooted phylogenetic trees given in Newick format (inputfile shows an example of input data).
